content: --- title: Baggage Services description: published: true date: 2024-09-05T12:16:39.682Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T12:05:50.325Z --- # Baggage Info Service ### Request ``` https://riverxtest.sunexpress.com/v1/ground/baggageInfo/{flightLegId}?page={page}&size={size} ``` ### Response ```json { "result": [ { "flightLegId": "13700628", "baggageInfos": [ { "extraInfo": "VIP Baggage", "baggageId": "326516", "pnr": "PACVBV", "inboundLegId": "326507", "outboundLegId": "326508", "status": "Loaded", "weight": 20, "isExcess": "N", "reason": "DELETED OFF", "carrier": "XQ", "udor": "2023-03-10", "flightNumber": "1111" } ] } ], "totalPage": 1, "totalItem": 1 } ``` ### GraphQL Query Root ``` getBaggageInfos ``` # Baggage Statistics Service ### Request ``` https://riverxtest.sunexpress.com/v1/ground/baggageStatistics/{flightLegId} ``` ### Response ```json { "extraInfo": "string", "flightLegId": "10419840", "udor": "2023-02-21", "carrier": "XQ", "flightNumber": "232", "regId": "TCSTX", "aircraftType": "73H", "numberOfTotalBaggage": 164, "totalBaggageWeight": 2738, "bookedTotalCargoWeight": 322, "actualTotalCargoWeight": 325, "numberOfExcessBaggage": 0, "totalExcessBaggageWeight": 0 } ``` ### GraphQL Query Root ``` getBaggageStatistics ```
